survey_name: Home Internet Service Provider Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers regarding their satisfaction with their home internet service provider, focusing on reliability, speed, customer service, and overall value.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current home internet service provider?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels effectively.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current home internet service provider?

questions.question_text: Which of the following issues have you experienced with your home internet service in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture common pain points.

script.question_text: Which of the following issues have you experienced with your home internet service in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you experience internet outages?
questions.client_notes: Use clear frequency options to gauge reliability.

script.question_text: How often do you experience internet outages?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you chose your current internet service provider?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an open-text follow-up for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you chose your current internet service provider?

questions.question_text: Please describe any additional comments or concerns you have about your home internet service.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: Please describe any additional comments or concerns you have about your home internet service.
